1. The Solution - Internalization of Costs

The Fresh Earth ecosystem aims to address these challenges by creating an economic system that internalizes the true cost of food production on the environment and human health. By incentivizing regenerative agriculture practices and creating a comprehensive, community-based food system, the Fresh Earth ecosystem will empower individuals and businesses to take control of their food sources and improve the quality and nutritional density of the food they consume, while regenerating the environment.

The key to this solution is the Fresh Earth Token (FET), a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) that manages the food ecosystem business. The token represents fractional ownership of the ecosystem and is valued based on both the value of the ecosystem's assets and the future impact of regenerative projects on the environment and society. The Fresh Earth ecosystem is designed to incentivize participation and engagement through a variety of different Incentive Drivers, which include a B2B and B2C marketplace, a Project Management Platform, a Data Managment Platform, and a Rewards System.

1. The Opportunity

The global market for organic and functional food is growing rapidly, driven by consumer awareness of the environmental and health problems associated with the conventional agrifood industry. The Fresh Earth ecosystem presents an opportunity for investors, farmers, and businesses to be part of this growing market, while also contributing to the regeneration of the environment and the improvement of global food security. By participating in the Fresh Earth ecosystem, stakeholders can benefit from the increased value of the FET token as the ecosystem grows and the impact of regenerative projects becomes more apparent.

The Fresh Earth Token (FET) is the core of the Fresh Earth ecosystem, representing fractional ownership of the ecosystem and serving as a store of value, medium of exchange, and unit of account for the ecosystem. The token is designed to align incentives between token holders, farmers, and the ecosystem, and to incentivize participation and engagement through various incentive drivers.

5.2. Token Name and Symbol

The token's name is the Fresh Earth Token, and its symbol is FET.

5.3. Token Overview

The token will also serve as a store of value, with its value derived from the assets of the ecosystem and the impact of regenerative projects on the environment and society.
